description.name: User can use app to add new reference

given.name: app runs and command add is selected

scenario.name: user can add a book even if they leave a necessary field empty at first

given.name: app runs and command add is selected

when.name: a necessary field is left empty at first but then books information is given correctly

scenario.name: when adding a book, app asks all the right questions

given.name: app runs and command add is selected

then.name: all the right questions are asked
